title: User Registration with JWT Token Issuance
description: Verify that new users can register successfully and receive a valid JWT token and refresh token.

steps.description: Send a registration request with valid user data.
Check that the user is created in the database.
Verify that a valid JWT token and refresh token are issued and returned.

title: User Login with JWT Token Refresh Flow
description: Verify user login with correct credentials and the refresh token flow for renewing JWT tokens.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid username/email and password.
Ensure the login is successful and JWT tokens are returned.
Send refresh token request to renew the JWT token.
Validate that a new JWT token is issued and is valid.

title: Guest Checkout Account Creation and Notification
description: Verify guest checkout flow creates new user with generated credentials, sends welcome email, and returns auth token.

steps.description: Start booking as guest and provide an unused email.
Complete booking and confirm user account creation.
Check that a new user is created with generated password.
Verify welcome email is sent with login credentials.
Validate an authentication token is returned for the new user.

title: Guest Checkout with Existing Email Error
description: Verify that guest checkout attempt with existing user email returns proper error response.

steps.description: Begin guest checkout using an email already registered.
Submit booking details.
Verify the system returns an error indicating the email already exists.

title: Class Browsing and Detailed Session Selection
description: Validate that users can browse classes and select sessions with accurate details including dates and times.

steps.description: Navigate to class listing page.
Verify all available classes for the tenant/school are displayed.
Select a class to view detailed session information.
Check that session dates, times, participant limits, and instructor info are accurate and complete.

title: Multi-step Booking Flow with Participant Management
description: Test the booking modal workflow including participant data entry, session selection, and booking confirmation.

steps.description: Start booking a class session.
Enter participant details for each participant.
Verify validation of participant data including required fields.
Complete booking and confirm reservation.
Check that reservation is created with correct participant and session details.

title: Booking State Preservation Across Navigation
description: Verify that booking data is preserved when the user navigates away and returns or logs in during the booking process.

steps.description: Begin booking a session and enter partial information.
Navigate to another page or perform login as existing user.
Return to booking flow.
Verify that previously entered booking information is still present and intact.

title: Reservation Management - Create, Update and Cancel
description: Validate the full lifecycle of a reservation including creation, updates to participant info/session and cancellation with status tracking.

steps.description: Create a new reservation via API or UI.
Verify reservation details are stored correctly with accurate status.
Update reservation details such as participant info or session time.
Check updated reservation reflects changes and maintains data integrity.
Cancel the reservation.
Confirm reservation status is updated to cancelled and related data integrity is maintained.

title: Payment Voucher Upload and Admin Verification
description: Test payment voucher upload functionality and subsequent verification by admin with accurate status update in dashboard.

steps.description: Upload payment voucher for a reservation.
Verify voucher is stored successfully and linked to the correct payment record.
Admin reviews and marks the payment as verified.
Check that payment status changes to verified and UI updates correctly.

title: Application of Discount Codes During Payment
description: Verify discount codes can be applied during payment, affecting the final amount and respecting expiration/usage rules.

steps.description: Enter a valid discount code during payment process.
Confirm the discount is applied and reflected in the total amount.
Attempt to use an expired or invalid discount code.
Verify the system rejects the discount code with an appropriate error message.

title: Role-based Access Control in Dashboards
description: Verify that students, instructors, school admins, and super admins only access data and controls appropriate to their roles and tenancy.

steps.description: Login as student and access dashboard.
Ensure only student-specific views and personal reservations are accessible.
Login as instructor and access dashboard.
Check instructor-specific classes, schedules, and student lists are visible and editable.
Login as school admin.
Verify access to all classes, reservations, students, payments of their school only.
Login as super admin.
Confirm full access to manage all schools, users, and system settings.
Attempt to access dashboards or data beyond role privileges.
Validate access is denied with appropriate error or redirect.

title: Multi-tenant Data Isolation Verification
description: Ensure users and admins from one surf school cannot access data belonging to other schools.

steps.description: Login as a school admin for School A.
Verify dashboard displays only School A data.
Attempt API calls or direct access to data/assets of School B.
Confirm access is rejected due to multi-tenant data isolation enforcement.

title: Email Notifications Triggered on Key User Actions
description: Test that email notifications are sent correctly for welcome emails, reservation confirmations, cancellations, payment receipts, and reminders.

steps.description: Trigger user registration or guest checkout.
Confirm welcome email is sent with correct content.
Create a reservation.
Verify reservation confirmation email is sent.
Cancel an existing reservation.
Check that cancellation email is dispatched.
Upload payment voucher.
Ensure payment receipt email is sent upon admin verification.
Trigger reservation reminder via scheduled job.
Validate reminder email is sent in a timely manner.

title: In-App Real-Time Notifications Functionality
description: Verify notifications appear in real-time in the notification center UI, can be marked read and status updates persist.

steps.description: Perform an action triggering a notification (e.g. reservation confirmed).
Check notification appears instantly in the UI notification center.
Mark the notification as read.
Confirm notification status updates and persists across page reload.

title: Admin Management of Classes, Instructors, and Users
description: Verify that authorized admins can create, update, and soft delete classes, instructors, and users with proper role and data validation.

steps.description: Login as school admin.
Create a new class with valid data.
Check the class is created and visible in listings.
Update existing instructor details.
Verify that changes are saved and reflected.
Soft delete a user.
Ensure user is marked deleted without removing data from database.
Attempt unauthorized modifications without admin rights.
Validate that access is blocked appropriately.

title: Product and Beach/Location Management
description: Test that products (equipment) and beach location data can be created, updated, and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Create a new product with valid details.
Verify product is visible in product selection and linked properly.
Add or update a surf beach location with mapping details.
Confirm that location details including map display correctly.

title: Image Upload with Cloudinary and Fallback
description: Verify that images can be uploaded successfully to Cloudinary and fallback to local storage is handled correctly upon failure.

steps.description: Upload image file through the image management interface.
Check that image is stored on Cloudinary and accessible.
Simulate Cloudinary upload failure.
Confirm image is stored locally instead and system handles fallback gracefully without data loss.

title: Statistics Dashboard Data Accuracy
description: Validate that analytics and statistics on school dashboards display accurate data about classes, reservations, and revenue.

steps.description: Access the statistics dashboard as a school admin.
Verify statistics reflect current data in the system for the correct school.
Compare statistics numbers with raw database counts for classes, reservations, and payments.
Confirm data aggregation is accurate and consistent.

title: Reservation Cancellation Email and Notification
description: Ensure that when a reservation is cancelled, proper cancellation email and in-app notification are sent to the user.

steps.description: Cancel an existing reservation.
Verify cancellation email is sent to the user.
Check that an in-app notification about the cancellation appears in the userâ€™s notification center.
